title: Opportunities
description: **Lighthouse Hacks** is a fun-filled day of learning, building, and networking. You'll get to get to work on a project with a team of four and pitch your ideas to a panel of judges. Additionally, you get an opportunity to attend workshops, meet new people, and build connections.
